---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/cosmos/unstaking/get-flow-status-completed
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://cosmos-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/34a3e428-2cad-4205-bd17-ea3ba2fc8c2e' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `undelegate_tx_broadcasting` to `unbonding` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "34a3e428-2cad-4205-bd17-ea3ba2fc8c2e",
  "state": "unbonding",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2022-12-17T10:41:26.000Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "cosmos1u85upk2v7pr65g0wv2976zleu6v8qjl9qprvzl",
    "validator_address": "cosmosvaloper1t8dv80kdq3t2g88kn8vtyeldvnf8xq5c4sklmx",
    "amount": "0.099998",
    "memo": null,
    "gas_price": null,
    "gas_limit": null,
    "undelegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "61558c76f2c70104bf4643e1bd91890a0c7897472178435bd345135297177acd",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "40AE86E9E30C398BBDA1823108BA2725356250ACF0AB701ABCBE2C41E0C66703",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "cosmos1u85upk2v7pr65g0wv2976zleu6v8qjl9qprvzl",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_number": 13608945
    },
    "estimated_unbonded_at": "2022-12-17T10:41:26.000Z",
    "pubkey": "0a2102db66d27dd215f1a61e5f4gga098b5293cc1da6f5c3557974ad5f39a2ec0fe125"
  },
  "network_code": "cosmos",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-12-15T10:37:31.604Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-12-15T10:41:40.615Z"
}
```

### Token Undelegation Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully undelegated your ATOM tokens.
